statements: UPDATE support_tickets SET resolved = true WHERE ticket_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
UPDATE support_tickets SET resolution_description = 'Issue resolved successfully', created_at = '2022-05-20 10:30:00' WHERE ticket_id = '98765432-1234-5678-9012-345678901234'
UPDATE support_tickets SET resolution_description = 'Ticket resolved successfully', resolved = true WHERE ticket_id = 'abcdef-12345-ghijk'
UPDATE support_tickets SET resolved = false, created_at = '2022-01-15 10:00:00' WHERE customer_id = 'xyz-789'
UPDATE tickets SET issue_description = 'Resolved issue with login' WHERE ticket_id = 123
UPDATE ticket_resolution SET resolution_details = 'Resolved and closed the ticket' WHERE resolution_id = 456
UPDATE tickets SET issue_description = 'Ticket resolved', ticket_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE ticket_id = 101
UPDATE ticket_resolution SET resolution_details = 'Issue resolved successfully', resolution_date = '2022-10-20' WHERE ticket_id = 102
UPDATE customer_support_tickets SET issue_description = 'Ticket resolved' WHERE ticket_id = 1;
UPDATE resolution_history SET resolved_by = 101, resolution_description = 'Issue fixed' WHERE ticket_id = 3;
UPDATE customer_support_tickets SET issue_description = 'Issue resolved', creation_date = '2022-09-15' WHERE ticket_id = 101
UPDATE resolution_history SET resolved_by = 202, resolution_description = 'Resolution provided', resolution_date = '2022-09-20' WHERE ticket_id = 105
UPDATE tickets SET ticket_description = 'Resolved issue with login', ticket_status = 'Closed' WHERE ticket_id = 101;
UPDATE customers SET customer_phone = '+1-800-123-4567', customer_email = 'test@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 201;
UPDATE tickets SET ticket_status='Resolved' WHERE ticket_id=101;
UPDATE customers SET customer_name='Alice', customer_email='alice@example.com' WHERE customer_id=201;

UPDATE customers SET email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 3;
UPDATE tickets SET ticket_status = 'Resolved', ticket_description = 'Issue resolved successfully' WHERE ticket_id = 101;
UPDATE customers SET email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 201;
